headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Garmin (GRMN) Expanding Into Wearables and Marine Tech With CES Awards
summary: In the past week, Garmin received five CES 2026 Innovation Awards for new wearables and unveiled the GPSMAP 9000xsv marine chartplotters, highlighting recent advancements in smartwatches, digital health, sports technology, and marine electronics. This surge in product innovation has spotlighted Garmin's expanding presence across diverse technology categories, underscoring its ability to deliver industry-leading features and attract market attention. We'll assess how these multi-category...
